item.title: Is Tallow Balm Safe for Acne? Everything You Need to Know
item.description: Is Tallow Balm Safe for Acne? Many people worry that using an animal-based balm like tallow balm NZ could clog pores and trigger breakouts. But in reality, tallow is one of the best natural moisturisers for acne-prone skin. 1. Tallow Balm Mimics Your Skin’s Natural Oils ✔ Non-greasy and fast-absorbing → Won’t sit heavily on the skin. ✔ Balances oil production → Helps regulate sebum levels instead of overloading the skin.
